ygData.subject: Re: Lifetap line of spells
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a level 10 necro and I have found that the resist is only true of deep reds basically they just put a resist cap on our lifetap spells similar to all
ygData.messageBody:
I have a level 10 necro and I have found that the resist is only true of
deep reds basically they just put a resist cap on our lifetap spells similar
to all other caster resist cap. So it you try to life tap a sand giant it
will be resisted but if you life tap something say only 5 levels above you
it will not be resisted. I have lifespiked many red and yellows that others
were fight and never got resisted except if it was a deep red and I was
resisted everytime. basically it will prevent exp twinking that nercos had
and could really exploit. It does not effect much else except the deal that
all other caster types have with there resist caps only our is unresistable
to the cap.
